title: -QUOTES-
observations_placeholder: Write details to consider for the quote.
quotes_info_text_1: Send us the photo and details of your design (via here or WhatsApp) and you'll receive the quote in 2-4 days.
quotes_info_text_2: To start manufacturing, confirmation and a 50% deposit are required. The rest is paid upon delivery.
product_unavailable_text_1: If the model or size is not available, contact us.
product_unavailable_text_2: With confirmation and a 50% deposit, we'll manufacture the piece in 3-4 weeks.
market_joyas_info: CentroJoyero.com is a marketplace where jewelers publish and sell their products. It connects buyers and jewelers, offering unique pieces on a secure and intuitive platform.
